name: Indicator (Type URL) - Get Reputation
description: Retrieves the reputation of indicators of type ‘URL’ using configured threat intelligence tools.

params.value:
VirusTotal Detection Summary

Title of the document {{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}/{{vars.last_analysis_stats.values() | list | sum}}
Malicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}
Suspicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.suspicious}}
Harmless
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.harmless}}
Community Votes
Harmless {{vars.community_votes.harmless}}
Malicious {{vars.community_votes.malicious}}

{% if vars.foundAVReputation %}

Alien Vault OTX Summary

Tags
{{(vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_AlienVault_OTX.data.results | json_query("[*].tags[]") | unique | string).replace("[","").replace("]","")}}

{% endif %}

steps.name: Get URL Reputation from Fortinet Web Filter

arguments.name: Fortinet Web Filter Lookup
arguments.operationTitle: Check Category of Domain or URL

params.value:
{% if vars.foundFortinetWebFilterReputation %}

FortiGuard Lookup

Category
{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Fortinet_Web_Filter.data.category}}
{% endif %}

{% if vars.foundAnomaliReputation %}

Anomali Threatstream Summary

{% if vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore!=0 %}
{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
Severity: {{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{%else%}
{{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
Severity: {{vars.steps.Get_URL_Reputation_from_Anomali.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}{% endif %}

{% endif %}

steps.name: Start
steps.description: Indicator reputation is set as 'TBD' by 'Create and Link Indicator' utility playbook. We can ignore those indicators when triggering this PB

params.value:
{% if vars.foundURLvoidReputation %}

URL Void Detection Summary

URLVoid
{%if 'detections' in vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data %} {{vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data.detections.count}}{%else%} 0 {%endif%}
IP Address: {{vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_URLVoid.data.details.ip.addr}}
{% endif %}

{% if (vars.tags| length >0) %}

Tags
{{( vars.tags| unique | string).replace("[","").replace("]","")}}

{%endif%}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

params.value:
{% if (vars.categories | length > 0 or vars.tags | length > 0) %}

Additional Summary

{% if (vars.categories | length > 0) %}
Security Vendor Scanning Results
{{vars.steps.Compute_VT_Categories.data}}
{%endif%}
{% if (vars.tags | length > 0) %}
Virustotal Tags
{{vars.steps.Compute_VT_Analysis.data['formatted_string']}}
{%endif%}
{%endif%}

routes.name: Get URL Reputation from URLScan -> wait
wait -> Get Screenshot URL
Get File Reputation from Anomali -> Compute Anomali Summary
Get Reputation from URLVoid -> Copy  of Compute AV OTX Summary
Configuration -> Get Reputation from URLVoid
Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX -> Copy  of Compute Anomali Summary
Configuration -> Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX
Configuration -> Get File Reputation from Anomali
Configuration -> Get Domain Reputation
Set Malicious -> Enrichment Summary
Set Good -> Enrichment Summary
Set No reputation -> Enrichment Summary
Enrichment Summary -> Is Upon Create
Is Upon Create -> Summary
routes.label: Referenced

routes.name: Is Upon Create -> Update Record
routes.label: Upon Create

routes.name: Get Domain Reputation from Fortinet Web Filter -> Compute Fortinet Web Filter Summary
Configuration -> Get Domain Reputation from Fortinet Web Filter
Configuration -> Get URL Reputation from URLScan
Get Screenshot URL -> Compute Url Scan Summary
Compute Anomali Summary -> Copy  of Is Malicious
Compute AV OTX Summary -> Copy  of Is Malicious
Compute URLVoid Summary -> Copy  of Is Malicious
Compute Fortinet Web Filter Summary -> Copy  of Is Malicious
Compute Url Scan Summary -> Copy  of Is Malicious
Set Suspicious -> Enrichment Summary
Copy  of Is Malicious -> Set Malicious
routes.label: Malicious

routes.name: Copy  of Is Malicious -> Set Good
routes.label: Safe

routes.name: Copy  of Is Malicious -> Set No reputation
routes.label: No Reputation

routes.name: Copy  of Is Malicious -> Set Suspicious
routes.label: Suspicious

routes.name: Get URL Reputation from VT -> Compute VT Analysis
Compute VT Analysis -> Compute VT Categories
Compute VT Categories -> Compute VT Summary
Compute VT Summary -> VT Additional Summary
VT Additional Summary -> Is Malicious
Is Tenant Shared -> No Operation
routes.label: No

routes.name: Is Tenant Shared -> Configuration
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get License Details -> Is MSSP Environment
Start -> Get License Details
Is MSSP Environment -> Is Tenant Shared
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Is MSSP Environment -> Configuration
routes.label: No
